name: RG&B
description:
Description

A Small Puzzle Game Made in 3 days for the MiniJam 73 - Limited by the use of only 5 colors at a time.  All the assets are original, inlcuding the soundtrack and sound effects. Enjoy!

Controls

W A S D / Arrow Keys - Movement

R - Reset Level

E / Esc - Quit

The Team

- Eduardo Ferrari

- Francisco Weltman

- Gabriel Felberg

- Gabriel Teixeira
